fsrtool.name: fsrtool_api_calls
fsrtool.structure: CREATE TABLE `fsrtool_api_calls` ( `accessMask` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `type` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `name` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `groupID` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `description` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', PRIMARY KEY (`accessMask`,`type`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
